data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Ngatpang that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ngatpang, Palau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Ngatpang, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 500 souls in Ngatpang and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Ngatpang.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ngereklmadel
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ngereklmadel, Ngatpang, Palau.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Ngatpang, Palau.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ngatpang, Palau a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Ngatpang, Palau has a population of 500.

We estimate Ngatpang has 111 people who might know Jesus, 368 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 4.33 percent of the people of Ngatpang are far from Jesus.
